column5: Main urban centre located on the coast with high consumption of imported rice.
column12: Important staple food produced and consumed throughout the country. Millet accounted for 8% of the total dietary energy supply (DES) in 2005-07. On average in 2004-08 per capita consumption (as food) of millet was 33 kg/yr. The self-sufficiency ratio of millet was 100%.
column13: Agence Nationale de la Statistique et la Démographie (ANSD)
